sentences.en: ...a historical pageant of kings and queens.
sentences.cn: …一场历史上的国王和王后们的盛大庆典。

sentences.en: a colourful pageant of Scotland’s past
sentences.cn: 重现苏格兰历史的绚丽盛典

sentences.en: Candy: Guess what. Vanessa just told me that she's in a pageant.
sentences.cn: 坎蒂: 猜我听到甚么, 凡内莎刚告诉我她去选美.

sentences.en: Life was a colorful painful pageant to her.
sentences.cn: 生活对她说来是一场丰富多彩而痛苦的表演.

sentences.en: Our pageant represented scenes from history.
sentences.cn: 我们的露天历史剧上演一幕幕的历史事件.
雨使华丽的庆典大为逊色.

sentences.en: Secondly, the 2008 Olympics will be a red pageant.
sentences.cn: 其次, 二零零八年的奥林匹克运动会将是一次红色的盛会.

sentences.en: She beat out 14 other lovlies to win the beauty pageant.
sentences.cn: 她击败了其他14美女,赢得选美比赛.

sentences.en: The coronation of the new king was a pageant.
sentences.cn: 新国王的加冕典礼是一场极其壮观的典礼.

sentences.cn: 新国王的加冕典礼非比寻常壮观.

sentences.en: The gerewol , or male beauty pageant, is also a test of stamina.
sentences.cn: 或者说是美男赛会, 同时也是对精力的一种考验.

sentences.en: The incomparable pageant is below and about us.

sentences.en: The rest were an insubstantial pageant.
sentences.cn: 其余的人都不过是华而不实的过眼烟云罢了.

sentences.en: The sitting - room's hardwood floor reflecting the charming pageant above its polished surface.
sentences.cn: 客厅宽敞,硬木地板光可鉴人.

sentences.en: The Tournament of Roses is the oldest and largest of the New Year's pageant.
sentences.cn: 玫瑰花赛会是历史最悠久,规模最宏大的新年庆典.

sentences.en: To me the pageant of seasons is a thrilling and unending drama.
sentences.cn: 在我看来,一年四季的绚丽景色犹如一出无尽的动人的戏剧.

trans.tran_cn: 盛会，露天表演，虚饰，选美比赛
trans.tran_en: A pageant is a colourful public procession, show, or ceremony. Pageants are usually held outdoors and often celebrate events or people from history.
